content.detailedDescription: I went to the kitchen to place a plate in the sink and i looked out the kitchen window and a black object caught my eye. i watch it  as it moved at a pretty slow speed. it was clearly not a plane, so i kept watching it. eventually it got out of my sight from the window, so i ran outside to see it. it kept moving at steady pace across the sky. at about the height of a plane or lower. it looked almost triangular in shape. it was the only thing in the sky. i ran inside to put on my flip flops and ran back out to look. i was in the house about 15 seconds, but when i came back out suddenly there were 2 of them. i have no idea where the other one came from. the sky was pretty clear above my house, and at that speed, there is no way that second one could of caught up. it came out of nowhere. the second one was oddly shaped. was not a triangular like the first. i have no idea what shape that was.  they were getting further way, i wanted to follow them, so i ran back inside to grab a shirt. when i came back out they were both gone. i took a walk around the neighborhood to see if i could spot them again, but nothing. both objects were black, no lights on it at all.  i don't know what they were but i'm 1000% sure they were not planes or helicopters.
content.summary: I saw 2 black objects in the sky, no clear shape, but definitley not planes.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking the dog with my boyfriend early memorial day morn before dawn, we were heading home & i noticed 2 star-like bright lights in the sky directly ahead of us to the west. the left light was brighter/larger than the right light, which seemed to be at a 33 degree angle (just checked the angle on a drawing i made immediately after returning home). i asked my bf "what is that?" & he said that it was probably planets in conjunction. that had been my first thought, too, but it didn't seem correct. the brightest light appeared 3x brighter than venus. the other light was about half that of the first. i kept watching the lights for maybe 10 seconds & realized they were slowly moving together in that alignment. i told my bf "it's moving!" we stood still in the middle of the street trying to figure out what it was. i listened for any kind of engine sound, thought i heard something for a split second at first while bf was talking (could have been a car or truck), but heard nothing more. it moved slow, silent, & steady with the lights in that alignment the entire time. it traveled about 1 mph, sw to ne, and seemed to be on a flight path, not unlike it was headed towards dia, except that it was lower than one would expect (difficult to judge, but probably less than 400 yards above the trees, maybe around 200 yds). 

as it approached nearly overhead of us, i could make out a faint shape on the "front" between the lights. it was concave like a crescent or wave shape that was a hazy bluish-grey color. it really seemed to mimic the wispy clouds. it also moved in perfect alignment with both lights. i could not make out the "back" of the craft. the hazy blue crescent just faded to black. from light to light the craft seemed the size of a football field. i asked my bf if he could see the blue crescent in between the lights. he could & thought light was reflecting off the "front". he also could not make out the "back". at this point i waved to it like a little kid to let it know we acknowledged it. i felt totally calm, yet excited to see this thing. bf said later he didn't feel scared, but that it was intense. dog was calm the whole time. when it was past us a little to the ne, we saw a shooting star (red) fall in front of it. interestingly, my bf said that he'd said a silent prayer right before that. when the craft should have blocked a star it was crossing over, it didn't; it seemed transparent. bf differs on what he saw concerning this. then the treetops began obscuring our view, we started running east towards the park for a better view, but it was gone, apparently into the big wall of clouds to the east.

from where we stood when i first noticed it, it seemed about 2-3 miles away due west. there was cloud cover in all directions, except for this large clear patch stretching maybe 2 miles w-e around us & 1-2 miles n-s. low, wispy clouds were prevalent closest to us on the w, sw, & nw and a big cloud wall was to the e, ne, & se. the air felt extra humid for denver. i feel lucky that there was this break in the cloud cover for us to see it. the entire viewing from first noticing lights to it disappearing was 3-5 minutes. neither of us had seen a ufo before this. we don't drink or do drugs. we regularly take night walks with the dog & look up at the stars. we have both seen a stealth over denver in daylight. that gave me an ominous feeling, this ufo did not. it was silent the whole time. no red or blue blinking lights. it was definitely not a conventional aircraft. although i wasn't scared at the time (i always thought i would be if i saw a ufo), i've been a little nervous since. didn't take a walk the next night or two, haha. posted on facebook initially & a friend said to post here. hadn't heard about mufon before; thank you for your work & website.
content.summary: Silent craft over south denver, hazy blue concave shape, first appeared like two stars or planets in conjunction

content.detailedDescription: It happened when i went on break at the hospital where i work, i was coming back from break and was walking back to the hospital from my car and i glanced up at the sky, something was different so i scanned the sky more carefully and there was a v-shaped object flying south to north over the hospital, no lights but the object was huge, it moved slowly and you could see the surrounding stars but it was like looking at them under water-or a better description is putting a glass in water and peering at objects in the water through the glass. anyway the object was moving slowly and it made absolutely no sound at all. i watched it for approximately 5 min until the hospital blocked my view.
content.summary: The object was more v-shaped than triangle and traveled north toward st. louis the shape distorted the stars around it, no lights were visible.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving east bound from flagstaff, az to leupp, az, i noticed a red light in the sky. it was approx 800 feet in the air and at first i assumed it was a helicopter because of the low flying distance. i rolled the window down to see if i could hear any type of noise; no sound was present. the time was 1:21am; and as i drove onward, the light descended and flew about 4 feet above the ground. i was able to clearly see it light the ground up red. it flew parallel to my vehicle and just about kept the same speed as my vehicle (65mph). the orb itself, was red, and emitting a red glow - darker red in the center, brighter red around the edges. it was to the left of the vehicle, approx 50 yards away. at this point i was feeling panicked, afraid and curious.

as the road turns, i broke sight of the light and while i was turning the bend, a bright light caught my attention in the corner of my eye. the orb, now bright white, and approx 8 inches in diameter, was now flying alongside my vehicle, no more than 8-12 inches above the road. it was flying on the shoulder of the on-coming lane and kept perfect speed with my vehicle (65mph). the time was now 1:24am. while viewing this object, i had no feelings of emotion and i was calm and collected. no noise, besides engine noise was noted, the only notable difference was the presence of cellphone signal (there usually is none). it followed my vehicle for a quarter mile, and it sped up 2 car lengths in front of me and abruptly made a 90 degree turn, upward into the sky, at which point, i leaned forward to see it shoot across the sky, like a shooting star toward the east. it was not as bright when i saw it disappear in the sky.

i arrived at my destination at 1:36am. as i was pulling into the driveway, my headlights shone upon a rabbit, sitting where i was about to park. i stopped within 3 feet of the rabbit, which did not move, flinch, blink, of any sort. it was very large and from the ground to the top of the head (not including the ear length) about the height of my hood (approx 37 inches tall). it's width was approx 20 inches wide and it was brown and white mixed color with no distinct pattern or spots. it's eyes were black and it was sitting upright, like that of a cat. the ears were very stiff, long and together, and they were slanted back at an angle, like that of a jackrabbit. at this point, i began to panic, and i called a 2nd party to tell them of what i was seeing. the car remained running with the headlights on and i sat staring at this huge rabbit for about 5 minutes. after talking, i turned my engine and headlights off, and with the outside light from the house, i was able to keep eye contact with the rabbit as i exited the vehicle and proceeded to walk slowly around the rear of the vehicle and into the house, not breaking sight. the area seemed to be still and calm; i did not hear any usual night noises (bugs chirping, dogs barking, etc). once inside, i remained on the phone until 2:12am.
content.summary: Red orb that changed to white, approx 8in diameter

content.detailedDescription: The big ship was the size of a football feild long and half a football feid wide and there all diference like of light under the ship. in the middle the ship there was like a window that go all around it. i look like to me hovered over the trees cross the country road that is. i can tell you more if you like to know more
content.summary: Will where there frist two smalls ships . then the the big one .

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on the porch of my apartment having a cigarette i randomly took a picture of the sun.  the second picture is a closeup of the object.
content.summary: On porch taking picture of the sun

content.detailedDescription: I was on my morning bike ride on 06/22/11 around 7:30 am i stopped to take a break, before i turned to go back home. i noticed the sun was very bright and peeking thru the clouds looked inspirational. i thought i would take a picture of it to post on my f.B for inspirational words on exersice. so when i came home i opened the picture to post and show my wife how pretty the sun was. it was then i noticed this oval amber light. i couldn't explain it, i thought maybe a reflection of the moon. my wife had said the moon wouldn't be over the sun. so i thought i would post it and see if i can find any corkey comments on my f.B. at school people said wow looks crazy i agreed. so i thought i would send it in and see if you guys had any leads or what you think. i called national ufo sightings and the guy was rude so i decided to bring the picure here instead. like i said i didn't know it was there at the time it didn't make a noise. if you look in the picture there is amber the reflects around the clouds as well.
content.summary: Oval amber shape cought on camera in crystal lake il by the beach.

content.detailedDescription:
While looking on google earth in area 51 found a cave with 3 metalic objects coming out which look like saucers, i thought you would be interested in this photo. i also found alot of ufo's over puru north of nazca. i also have had sightings in california and colorado

was camping on north coast california, was awakened by unknown factors and was awake as if i never was asleep. tent was positioned facing east i looked north to see these 2 lights flying south at a very slow rate. the one in front was bobbing up and down as if it couldn't be controled (line of flight looked like a heart beat line) the one in back was steady and streight. i watched this for some time until they were streight in my line of sight
content.summary: Looking on google earth

content.detailedDescription: On june 11 2011 i was outside with my cousin and my nefews. they were throwing the foot ball back and forth and my nefew went inside to get the pump for the ball. my cousin tied his shoe looked up and said (hey what is that.)i looked up and there were 14 to 15 objects in the sky my nefew ran inside and got my camera. soon after that i took a few pictures. they slowly moved all together but one that stayed right over above for about 15 min. some say ballons some say ufo you be the judge.
content.summary: 14 to 15 objects in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I am a delivery driver in the bay  area. after completing a deliver in woodside, ca i was headed towards  redwood city, ca. i was on woodside road in the direction of central ave. when i saw a cluster of silver or blackish sphere/circular objects. it reminded me of the cluster ufo videos you find online, but these were dark.

i immediately said "holy ****" out loud in the van. i pulled into the parking lot of karakade thai cuisine in the woodside road/central ave. area. all though there were plenty of people around, including people talking in the driveway nobody looked up to notice. i had my camera phone out and all. 

these objects were hovering in formation for several minutes. at first, they were headed towards me (south-ish, not exactly sure on the coordination) but when i parked they were headed back north where they were coming from (from sf, redwood city area) and upward. i thought for a minute that maybe they were a group of balloons, but that quickly changed.

as i watched and tried to record one of the balls came down semi-low. it was the strangest looking thing. it kept reflecting light from the sun but it looked red-ish in color but also looked like a sheet flapping in the air but in a ball. it was a solid object but it looked like it had waves in it. does that make sense? it was visibly not a balloon.

once again, all of these objects stayed in standard formations. triangle, orion's belt-like, etc. if they were balloons, would there be this many? there were over 10-20 of them at first. the reflections on them were intense at times. 

while filming, many of them disappeared over time. the final three were lined up in an "orion's belt" shape across the sky. they never strayed away from each other all though they were very distant a part. you could tell they were connected somehow. these objects i could no longer see the object, they were now just white lights. as the white lights hovered and looked star like, they just got higher and higher into the atmosphere until i could not see them. 

when reviewing my videos/photos only one of the out of 20 objects showed up on one photo. none of them showed up on video. even while filming i noticed they would not appear on camera.

here's the interesting thing... while reviewing my videos i noticed white balls fly across the sky at very high speeds. 

the video i uploaded consists of two videos combined. this video is at 0.25x speed. which means it is much slower than the original footage. i have the original footage available upon mufon's request. 

the photo uploaded has one ufo in the bottom center. you can zoom in to see it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo's over woodside, ca

content.detailedDescription:
My g/f, i and her dog were walking along oscar frye rd, somewhere around 1/4 of a mile from rt.268. we stopped for a smooch, when suddenly, i see what from my perspective, giant headlights to my left. they were spaced far wider than a standard plane's lights. and then, it did almost nearly a 90 degree barrel roll- and held that position for something like 2 minutes. while we're (or at least i was) goggling this sight- it traveled out of our sight behind a tobacco barn, and- well, we didnt see it for well past 30 seconds. it should have popped out from behind it in less than 10- at the speed and altitude it was going. it just simply.... took too long to appear. i started up the road, intent on looking for it (i was 40 feet from the building), i was 3/4 of the way back to it, when my g/f says 'here it comes!'it went over us, and right on cue (it had been completely silent the entire time) i said 'uh, where's the engine noise?' whoosh! suddenly, engine noise!

what happened next, i am not proud of, but it's sure to bring a chuckle... i was carrying a 9 iron, you know... just in case. as this thing got closer (noting the fact there were no formation lights, it had wings far too wide, and my g/f swears up, down and sideways the cockpit was the size of a bay window- it was far wider and longer than a standard cockpit window- more on that later)... i ended up 100% *convinced* it was not of this planet. it was headed for us, far too slowly, and basically stayed less than 45-50  feet up. was i scared? oh, hell no! i jumped up and down in absolute, unmitigated, unrestrained insane glee, holding the putter. and then realized i had no camera, and swore like a sailor in port. needless to say, the thing flew on, and disappeared behind some trees, completely.

*ahem*. anyways, even during this incredibly ridiculous display- i and my g/f noted the following:

no windows other than the cockpit. not even a lit 'the door is here' one.There's discussion as to it even *having* a standard door- it was the left side of the craft- where doors usually are...

the cockpit window was 10% longer than a standard jet cockpit. also, it was a continuous piece of window, not broken up by anything holding it up. i also have been told, it was a lot taller as well.

the 'cabin lights' were on, and unfortunately, all my g/f could see was a shape. yes, it was that close. 
i noticed wings too far up on the body, just too wide for the amount of 'jet', the 'on cue' engine noise, and the fact there was no jet wash. none. not even a slight breeze. 

there were no formation lights, only something akin to spotlights on the 'wings'. the underside of the wings were white metal, but instead of smooth and wheel well markings- it was a v shape from cockpit back as far as i could see in the craft lighting.

it was going hella slow for the altitude it was maintaining. 

what the hell took it so long to go behind, and then past the other side of a smallish, thin building? my theory is it stopped to hover. 

a nearly 90 degree smooth as silk roll? for 2 min?? also, i think it did do it for our benefit. as for the jet sound... there was something off about it, but i am just not sure what.
content.summary: It's (not) a bird- it looked like a plane! but.....

content.detailedDescription: I told the dispatcher was looked liked a landing light that was way to low made a high speed turn to the north then you could see about 8 to 10 in a tight formation.  kept going north till out of sight. the news the next day said it was self propelled space junk.  bs!
content.summary: Was on patroll looked to west big bright light moving east

content.detailedDescription:
Date: 23june2011

time 2210 -2225

place: intersection of hwy 79 and hi 35, and southward travel (on my way to work ).

event: as i turned onto the southbound feeder road i observed a white blinking light in the sky. it pulsed rapidly 4 times, then a short pause, then pulsed 4 times again it was this blinking that drew my attention to the lights. it seemed to be in the flight path for abia but the strange pattern of the flashing made me want to check and see if it was. after merging onto hi 35 southbound i looked for the light again, i located it and observed it was traveling on a ssw course and i expected it to turn as does all air traffic but the lights did not follow the air traffic pattern but instead continued ssw. at this time i was driving under hwy 45 (toll), after passing under the overpass i noted the position angle from me to the lights at position angle 3. again i noted that the lights flashed in a burst of 4, no other colored lights ever showed during my entire observation of this ���object���. at approximately 2220 i observed the lights change from a single flashing light to three flashing lights. they would start on the left pulse 4 times,  then the ���original��� lights  (center ones) would flash 4 times, then there would be 4 pulses on the right. the distance between the 3 lights appeared to be from wing tip to wing tip of a commercial airliner that i frequently observe on the flight path to abia.  at approximately 2225 i lost track of the lights as they faded into the distance / i prepared to exit the hwy. 

being a trained observer (os1, trained the lookouts aboard ship / sea combat air controller, controlled various aircraft while they preformed their missions.)i watch the air traffic in the area... and wish i was controlling aircraft again. when i first observed the single flashing light i thought it may be a helicopter or a plane making an approach to abia. when i looked again it had not made the turn that air traffic does during their approach to the airport nor did i observe any other colored lights. when the other white lights began flashing i had the impression that they ran in a single line across the back of something in the air. to me they seemed to be ���tail lights���, for lack of a better description. 

i have never observed lights of this nature before and i am left wondering just what i observed flying in a ssw direction over austin, texas on this night.
content.summary: Single flshing white light in sky, turned into 3 flashing white lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north on youree drive in shreveport, louisiana at 8:40 pm. as i passed lsus on the right i noticed a small circular object in the northwest part of the sky. it was getting close to sunset. the object was much lighter than sky. as i passed 70th the object was more to the west than the north, i could see it was actually teardrop shaped. it was unlike anything i had ever seen. it was reflecting the sun. not bright though. just making it a few shades lighter than the sky. the sky was a light peachy color. so it was much lighter than that. it did not move. it stayed stationary high in the sky. when i got to southfield rd nd turned left the many trees in the neighborhood blocked my view of it. i was late for an appointment so i could not turn around and try to locate it again.
content.summary: I saw a tear drop shaped object

content.detailedDescription: We were having severe storm warnings about all day. that evening the clouds begin to break up and there were some beautiful cummulis clouds behind the house with the suns rays shining thourgh the clouds.So i decided to get my camera and take some pictures.These pictures were taken within 1 minute and 30 seconds.When i went back into the house and down loaded the pictures onto my computer i notice there were some objects in several pictures. one oject was disc shape and the other was shape like a cigar/ cylinder shape.
content.summary: I was taking a few pictures of some storm clouds and when i down loaded they appeared in the pictures.

content.detailedDescription: I captured these strange lights on the wired ny web cams and thought i lost them...Out of nowhere this 3 light red ufo shows up it stays around for 10-15 minutes. so there goes bthe theory that there airplanes? i dont know what they are but there not planes or helicopters...Even stranger pictures of the last ones i just submited...You tell me....What are they???
content.summary: More strange ufos caught on nyc web cams look !!!

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside standing on the porch, when i noticed from the southeast a strange shining object. i said to my wife would you look at this it,s weird. there,s no sound at all and ,no fuel trail lines in the sky behind it like a plane, i think it's a ufo. she tried to take a picture with her camera phone, but couldn't get it in frame. my neighbors were trying to figure out what we were seeing right in front of us in broad daylight!! it was mooveing pretty slow  so m y neighbor went in her home and retrieved her binoculars.It was shaped like a  short fat misslie with 2 large circular lights beneath it. we watched it travel fron east to west until it was no longer visible.  about five minutes later it returned heading from the east to west. today (june 23 2011 about 3:10pm )we witness 3 or more military choppers flying the same directions as if they were tracking something in the air.They flew back and forth for about about 45 minutes.
content.summary: Ufo  flying over sw topeka kansas.

content.detailedDescription: 10:40 pm northward - dim star-like object, 11:07 pm eastward - bright star-like object (briefly flickered as it passed over - may have been a response after shining blue light through a crystal), 11:10 pm northward - dim star-like object, 11:22 pm - nw/n - dim star-like object, 11:30 pm - southward - dim star-like object, 11:44 pm - 1 northward - 1 southward - dim star-like objects, 11:52 pm - bright star-like object - eastward + 1 mil. aircraft northward brief flashes, 12:17 am - northward - dim star-like object. notes: beginning to stencil constellations and crop-circle designs projected by led and later infrared light as an experimental means of communication.
content.summary: Multiple flying star-like objects

content.detailedDescription:
It was about twelve midnight, i was driving easbound,  
when i noticed two bright lights in the distance off to the north.  
they appeared as though they were stationary, so i thought they must  
be helicopters or possibly stars. i didn't think anything of it at  
first, but i noticed one of the lights was slowly getting closer. as  
it gradually came nearer i noticed it was a cluster of lights. the  
object appeared to have three distinct lights on three corners of the  
vehicle. it appeared to have red lights and faint pulsating dim lights  
on the underbelly. i wanted to believe it was an airplane, but it  
moved like no other vehicle i have seen before. the object appeared to  
be extremely low for an airplane, and it was completely silent.
content.summary: Triangular in shape, bright lights on all corners of object with red lights underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
A diamond shaped object making no noise headed west after sundown on saturday june 18th, 2011.  the object had what appeared to be a flame emitting from the center of it.  there were no other lights and i could only make out the shape of the outline due to the shimmering from the center.

i was with my boss and his wife on their front driveway, it appeared to be descending as it headed west, possibly due to damage to the craft, hence the fire.  we were directly east of the florida everglades so the object headed into a sparsely populated area.
content.summary: Burning diamond shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
Close encounter  of the third kind, i think that is bloecher of kind b.

it was happen to my sister too. i see one entity like 1,6 meters of stature (tall) in the room library  from my home in the country, it was like 1 meter near about me. i was scared, the entity put his hands up and i dont remenber anymore of that day, i need support for this, i wanna know what happen that day, can you help me please?... thanx and good work by the way.... maybe i think that i know more in my locked mind, cya and thanx again!
content.summary: Sphere with blue ring

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I just got off of work in caribou maine. i was heading north on route 1 towards van buren maine. i saw a green objects that lasts maybe three seconds. green tail/middle with a white tip at the head. looked almost like a glowing flying tad pole. this last three seconds and it vanished. this wasn't a planet, plane or helicopter. i considered maybe a shooting star but am not sure. looking at images of shooting stars this was short, fat and didn't leave any type of trail behind as they do in the photos. i'm lucky i was able to view this as it happened so fast. i'm reporting this in case someone else out there saw what i saw tonight 6/23/2011 wed 12:38 am. while i wish to remain anon please share this information. in 41 years i have never seen something like this while driving. also the color dark green and glowing at the end and middle. this happened so fast i wouldn't have been able to take a photo. the object would have been gone before i pulled out any camera. over and under small cloud cover.
content.summary: Tad pole

content.detailedDescription: Facing east object appeared 2 oclock high moving high rate of speed. witnessed 2 zigzag patterns followed by a 120 instintaneous 120 degree chabge of direction. slowed to an apparent stop then resumed original course followed by another zigzag pattern. in the next 4 to 5 seconds, then traveled to a distance that ook it out of sight. fhis is only 1 of 4 sightings,2 of which occured in broad daylight. too many details two list by typed method. daylight sightings were at an altitude of below controlled airspace.
content.summary: Object appeared low earth orbit

content.detailedDescription:
From: 21/06/2011 @ 23:00
to: 22/06/2011 @ 02:00

flying object(s): star-like

# sighted: multiple, dozen(s)

notes:

- 2 bright white objects heading east
- multiple dim white objects (heading n/a)
- noteworthy ground vehicle tail light flashing

evidence: video & audio (withheld from public, avail. upon req.)
content.summary: Multiple star-like objects spotted

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from fargo to bismarck, and around the western edge of stutsman county i saw something egg or tear dropped shaped going straight down. it came from the very top of my windshield (line of vision) and disappeared into some clouds so was only visible for a few minutes, but more than enough time to see that it was something i have never seen before. i was on the phone with a friend while this was happening and they suggested taking a pic, but because it was so small and white looking compared to the blue of the sky, i figured my phone camera wouldn't work anyways. my windshield also had bug splatters, but what i saw was definitely not bug debris. it was white in appearance, like what you see when a jet goes overhead, though this was much larger (presumably much closer and going straight down towards the earth).
content.summary: Was going straight down, disappeared into clouds, was visible for a few minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was getting in my car after work and something caught my eye in the sky slightly to my east.  i saw a bright white object that looked like a fat missle (like from wwii) aiming down at a 45 degree angle. it had a skinny tail on top of it at a 120 degree angle. it moved across the sky kind of like a plane would, but it was moving in a very straigt, smooth path and flying very low. i was surprised to see a plane that low in this area. i'd guess that it was at about 500- 1,000 feet but don't know for sure. it was cloudy out with dark clouds in the eastern sky where i was looking so the object really stood out.  it moved behind trees and i couldn't see it after that.  i'd like to know what it was. after that, i headed home (west) on 23rd street.  i was at 291 highway and 23rd street and noticed a very strange cloud hanging low over an area around noland road.  it was low and black with sharp edges and a few puffy black clouds around it that were all the same size.  it looked very odd - i've never seen anything like it. it stayed there the entire time i was driving.
content.summary: Missle-shaped object over independence

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the marfa lights platform and watching the lights closely.I then noticed the lights when someone told me. when i first noticed it, i thought it was a car. then i remember there were no mountains seen above the tower. then i knew it was a marfa light or a ufo. there were two lights orbiting one another over the tower and stayed there for an hour before disappearing. after all that i was amazed. it disappeared out of thin air. it lasted for an hour.
content.summary: There were two lights orbiting one another over a tower.

content.detailedDescription:
i was on my lunch hour about 2145 bright headlight singular moving northwest which was straight towards me..It was cloudy and not dark out all the way yet. it startled me so i called me sister on the phone to see if she can go outside and veiw it, it turned more north and then appeared starlike almost disapeared then lit up brighter again then again turned once again west to east along the path of the river.It was one singular light but smaller so i hung up with my sis took a picture. then i called her back because more lights appeard on it. i cannot describe!!! what shape this object was all the lights i saw were white and there were no red and no blue and no green one of the white lights sort of .. undulated? not a strobe and not flashing like a plane or jet would flash..The lights were all in a row and there were smaller white lights in the back. i pulled out of my parking spot while on the phone to follow it.. and just as i did the lights were dimming which creeped me out completely  and it moved downward fairly quickly. i it looked like it it was treetop  by the time it disappeared..Out of veiw ..It should have landed on something.... i drove quickly around the curves at work to keep it in my sight, and it was gone.It was sooo eerie i kept my sis on the phone whiile i drove off grounds at work and down the river road and back and it was no where to be seen. 


 i have 2  photos on my phone. i sent them to (name deleted)fg
content.summary: Bright singular headlight,changing appearance as it changed directions

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on the porch of our apartment having a cigarette i took a picture of the sun where i have had much success capturing many pictures of ufo's.
content.summary: Taking random picture of the sun

content.detailedDescription: While siting on my porch of the apartment having a cigarette i randomly take pictures of the sun.  i captured a sphere shaped objects.  this is not the first time, i now have over 100 pictures of the sun with anywhere from 1 to several u.F.O.'s in the pictures.
content.summary: Taking random pictures of the sun sphere object captured
